title: What is the name of this inline/hand tooled serif?
content:
I'm trying to find out what the name of this font is, but it is eluding me. There are many inline serif's I've found, but none where the serif is so long or quite as vertical on the E, also many of the ones I located had a hollow stroke on the right side of the A where this one does not.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004741im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bake_5702.jpg)

Help me out guys! Please!
author: Incredulous

comments.content: I meant to say on the left side of the stroke on the capital 'A'.

Thank you very much, you made my day so much easier!

Incredulous
